title: Jun Liu-College of Economic and Social Development
content: Jun Liu is Associate Professor of Economics at Nankai University. He holds an undergraduate degree and a Ph.D. from Nankai University in China. Before coming to Nankai University in 2001, he worked at international trade and Securities company. Liu has worked in the areas of logistics planning and policy and Port Economics. He has published two books, including Research on the Logistics Industry Analysis and the Development of Port Economy, as well as over twenty articles in important academic journals.
